TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleClientFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory
Public NotInheritable Class OracleClientFactory Inherits DbProviderFactory
public ref class OracleClientFactory sealed : System::Data::Common::DbProviderFactory

Docs.summary: Representa um conjunto de métodos para criar instâncias de implementação de classes de fonte de dados do provedor Oracle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse tipo está preterido e será removido em uma versão futura do .NET Framework. Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand

Docs.returns: Uma nova instância fortemente tipada de .

remarks.format:
## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir retorna fortemente tipado <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instância.
```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

Public Shared ReadOnly Instance As OracleClientFactory

Docs.summary: Obtém uma instância do , que pode ser usada para recuperar objetos de dados fortemente tipados.

remarks.format:
## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleClientFactory.Instance> campo a recuperar uma <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleClientFactory> da instância e, em seguida, retornar fortemente tipado <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instância.
```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
